pynamics.sim.Sim¶

class pynamics.sim.Sim(topology: Topology, body_dynamics: Dict[str, BodyDynamicsParent] | None = None, joint_dynamics: Dict[str, JointDynamicsParent] | None = None)¶

The core class representing a Pynamics simulation

__init__(topology: Topology, body_dynamics: Dict[str, BodyDynamicsParent] | None = None, joint_dynamics: Dict[str, JointDynamicsParent] | None = None) → None¶

Initialize a Sim-ulation.

Args:

topology (Topology): A Topology object representing the initial condition. body_dynamics (typing.List[DynamicsParent], optional): A list of BodyDynamics modules to apply forces to the topology. Defaults to []. joint_dynamics (typing.List[DynamicsParent], optional): A list of JointDynamics modules to apply forces to the topology. Defaults to [].

Methods

__init__(topology[, body_dynamics, ...])

Initialize a Sim-ulation.

forward_dynamics(joint_space_forces)

Calculate the forward dynamics for the topology, i.e. joint space accelerations given joint-space forces.

get_nonlinear_forces()

Calculates the joint-space forces due to non-linear forces from the velocities of each body.

inverse_dynamics(joint_space_accelerations)

Calculate the inverse dynamics for the topology.

save_data(path)

Save the collected sim data to CSV.

simulate(delta_t, dt[, verbose])

Advance the simulation.

step(dt)

Advance the simulation by one step.

pynamics
